display_long_description:
**GLASS GRAPPLE** hurls you into a neon-drenched world of rhythm, precision, and pure velocity. A synthwave playground of shifting walls, narrow tunnels, and two rainbow-charged grapples that feel like extensions of your own hands.

Swing, slingshot, and bend your momentum through 25 levels, and 5 increasingly challenging Endless modes. 

Master the movement and swing your way to the top of the leaderboard. 

Featuring its own OST of some of the glassiest music, that layers as you progress.



Press **Trigger** to shoot a grapple

Hold **Trigger** to reel in

Press **Grip Button** to release
[media]

**Pull** the rope to propel yourself
[media]

Activate slo-mo for more control
[media]
